<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://nucor.eia.com/AO/Ebiz/L2C/BundleAM/1.0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:obj="http://nucor.eia.com/AO/Ebiz/L2C/BundleAO/1.0" xmlns:msg="http://nucor.eia.com/AO/Ebiz/L2C/BundleAM/1.0" xmlns:header="http://xmlns.eia.com/EO/common/Header/1.0" xmlns:res="http://xmlns.eia.com/AO/EBiz/common/OperationResultAO/1.0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en"> <Version>1.0</Version> <Definition>Bundle AO</Definition> <Description>This schema defines the objects to create or extract Bundles.</Description> <Author>Nirav Sanghavi</Author> <VersionDate>26-04-2016</VersionDate> <VersionDescription>Review and standardization</VersionDescription> <ModificationHistory>26-04-2016 Version 1.0 - Initial Development Version</ModificationHistory> </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.eia.com/EO/common/Header/1.0" schemaLocation="../../../../EO/common/V1.0/Header.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://nucor.eia.com/AO/Ebiz/L2C/BundleAO/1.0" schemaLocation="../../../../AO/EBiz/L2C/V1.0/BundleAO.xsd"/> <xsd:import schemaLocation="../../../../AO/EBiz/common/V1.0/OperationResultAO.xsd" namespace="http://xmlns.eia.com/AO/EBiz/common/OperationResultAO/1.0"/> <xsd:element name="QueryBundleByBolNoRequestMessage"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="header:HeaderRq"/> <xsd:element name="Bundle" type="obj:BundleType" minOccurs="0" nillable="true" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="QueryBundleByBolNoResponseMessage"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="header:HeaderRs"/> <xsd:element name="OperationResult" type="res:OperationResultType" minOccurs="0" nillable="true" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ListOfBundles" type="obj:ListOfBundlesType" minOccurs="0" nillable="true" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.eia.com/EO/common/Header/1.0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:header="http://xmlns.eia.com/EO/common/Header/1.0" xmlns:common="http://xmlns.eia.com/EO/common/Common/1.0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en"> <Version>1.0</Version> <Definition>Header for all mesages</Definition> <Description>This schema defines the header stucture for all web service calls</Description> <Author>Richard Lanchbury</Author> <ModifiedBy>Richard Lanchbury</ModifiedBy> <VersionDate>01-08-2010</VersionDate> <VersionDescription>Initial Version</VersionDescription> <ModificationHistory>01-08-2010 Version 1.0 - Initial Version</ModificationHistory> </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.eia.com/EO/common/Common/1.0" schemaLocation="Common.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="HeaderRq" type="header:HeaderRqType"/> <xsd:element name="HeaderRs" type="header:HeaderRsType"/> <xsd:complexType name="HeaderRqType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en"> <Definition>Request Message for Header</Definition> <ChangeDescription>Initial</ChangeDescription> </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransactionRequestID" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Request Id generated by the process of that particular system</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Language" type="common:LanguageCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Language</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ComponentID" type="common:C100"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ServiceName" type="common:C100"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TransactionIDREF" type="common:IDREF15" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reference Transaction ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TransactionName" type="common:C30" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Interface Description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FileName" type="common:C100" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>File Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FileInstanceID" type="common:Long" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>File Instance ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Source" type="common:SystemsList" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Source system</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Target" type="common:SystemsList" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Target system</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HostName" type="common:C25" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Oracle SOA Suite Server name. Requried when in a clustered environment.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="UserName" type="common:C15" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User Name specifying the user who has invoked this process.This is especially required for external users apart from OSB and BPEL.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="UserRole" type="common:C25" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User Role</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AdminEmail" type="common:C100" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>System administration contact email id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ApplicationResponsibility" type="common:C25" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Application Responsibility</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EOFFlag" type="header:EODFlagType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>End of file Flag</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SOFFlag" type="header:EODFlagType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Start of file Flag</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FileRecordCount" type="common:Long" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>File Record Count</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TimeStamp" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Current Date Time Stamp</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="common:C"> <xsd:pattern value="[1-2][0-9][0-9][0-9][/][0-1][0-9][/][0-3][0-9] [0-2][0-9]:[0-6][0-9]:[0-5][0-9]"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MillName" type="common:C25" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Mill Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="HeaderRsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en"> <Definition>Response Message for Header</Definition> <ChangeDescription>Initial</ChangeDescription> </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransactionID" type="common:TransactionID"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction Id of the service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RequestDetails" type="header:HeaderRqType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Header Transaction Details. Similar to Header request message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ResultCount" type="common:Integer" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Result Count for responses to queries</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Status" type="header:Status"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Standard Status Response to be sent back to the calling system.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Status"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en"> <Definition>Status of the operation</Definition> <ChangeDescription>Initial</ChangeDescription> </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Status" type="header:StatusTextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Success,Error,Warning</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="StatusFreeText" type="common:C50"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Status Free Text</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Exceptions" type="header:Exceptions" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Exceptions List</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Exceptions"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en"> <Definition>Exceptions</Definition> </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ObjectPath"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Xpath of the errored record in the payload.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An XPath Pattern e.g. /Programme/Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="common:C150"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="StatusCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service Execution Status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>0 means Success,+ve means Error,-ve means Warning.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="common:Integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="StatusText" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Error/Warning free text</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="common:C150"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AdditionalStatus" type="header:Exceptions" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Standard status response at line level. This will be only present if any of the lines have failed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="StatusTextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Status Text</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="common:ClosedEnum"> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Error"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Warning"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EODFlagType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>End of file flag</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="common:ClosedEnum"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>
